Name: Sidecar No. Blue
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: One orange liqueur, blue curacao, replaces another, triple sec, to give this Sidecar an aquamarine hue.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in February 2016 by Matthias Lataille, London, England. See: Sidecar, its history and variations .
Nutrition: One serving of Sidecar No. Blue contains 183 calories
